remarks: The base set of the final constructed Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilbase.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilbase.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilbase.l $e |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilbase.m $e |- M = ( Base ` L ) $.
hlhilbase $p |- ( ph -> M = ( Base ` U ) ) $.
